backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing prewritten summaries for key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining warm OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all marketing sections and passing centralized content into each.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer displaying business branding, owner name, and a small attribution section.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Simple about section with a title and descriptive paragraph centered on the page.
Contact section showing phone, email, address, hours, and a non-functional demo contact form.
Gallery grid displaying images with hover zoom effects in a responsive layout.
Renders a hero section with background image, business info, tagline, and scroll-to-contact/menu buttons.
Displays a menu grid of items with name, price, and description using card components.
Shows customer testimonials in a card grid with quotes and names.
Lists business highlights in a card grid with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TopNav: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling and anchor link navigation for all page sections.
frontend/src/content/rajFoodyContent.ts: Provides static content configuration for Raj Foody, including hero data, menu, highlights, gallery, testimonials, and contact details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting no backend queries are needed yet.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, required images, and feature list for building the Raj Foody website.
